  physical_appearance: The image depicts a painting. The portrait of a lady is the subject. She is depicted to be smiling and she adorns a blouse that is patterned with colourful flowers. Her facial features and hair are drawn with a pencil. The background of the painting contains images of stalks and flowers. These flowers are in red

 mother of the artist Dick Lee
 against a colourful background of flowers in full bloom. \r\n\r\nPopularly known as Dick Lee
 Richard Lee Peng Boon was born in 1956. He is a prolific singer and songwriter. He has also written many well known musicals including Beauty World (1988)
 Fried Rice Paradise (1991) and Forbidden City (2003). He was awarded the Singapore Cultural Medallion in 2005 for his achievements in music.

metadata.physical_appearance: The image depicts a painting. The portrait of a lady is the subject. She is depicted to be smiling and she adorns a blouse that is patterned with colourful flowers. Her facial features and hair are drawn with a pencil. The background of the painting contains images of stalks and flowers. These flowers are in red, yellow, and blue.
metadata.sgcool_label_text:
This work depicts Elizabeth Lee, mother of the artist Dick Lee, against a colourful background of flowers in full bloom. 

Popularly known as Dick Lee, Richard Lee Peng Boon was born in 1956. He is a prolific singer and songwriter. He has also written many well known musicals including Beauty World (1988), Fried Rice Paradise (1991) and Forbidden City (2003). He was awarded the Singapore Cultural Medallion in 2005 for his achievements in music.
